title: Conjuration Spells
content:
Lv 6 Conjuration ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Produce a feast for 12 guests that cures diseases, immunizes to poison and increases hp by 2d10 for 24 hours. Cleric, Druid Planar Ally Lv 6 Conjuration ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Summon a deva, djinn or cambion that will help the caster until a long rest. Cleric Wall of Thorns Lv 6 Conjuration ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Create an 60-ft-long, 10-ft-high, 5-ft-thick wall of brush that slows movement and can inflict 7d8 piercing damage (damage/lvl). Druid

1~
